title: Installation from source in Indigo: gazebo_ros_pkgs and sandia_hand

content.raw:
In the tutorial instructions, under Ubuntu + Indigo, using gazebo_ros_pkgs-current with drcsim and gazebo4 leads to compilation errors. The deb package ros-indigo-gazebo4-ros-pkgs works instead.

Also, the user should be instructed to switch the sandia_hand branch to a stable branch instead of default. (I used sandia_hand_5.2--are there any known issues with DRCSim and this branch?)
